member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes
member.summary: MIME content types for assets that Godot can load at runtime. These are standard formats that Godot's buffer-based APIs support.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.TexturePng
member.summary: PNG image format. Loaded via Image.LoadPngFromBuffer().

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.TextureJpeg
member.summary: JPEG image format. Loaded via Image.LoadJpgFromBuffer().

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.TextureWebp
member.summary: WebP image format. Loaded via Image.LoadWebpFromBuffer().

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.ModelGltfBinary
member.summary: glTF binary format (glb). Loaded via GltfDocument.AppendFromBuffer().

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.ModelGltfJson
member.summary: glTF JSON format. Loaded via GltfDocument.AppendFromBuffer().

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.AudioWav
member.summary: WAV audio format. Loaded into AudioStreamWav.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.AudioOgg
member.summary: OGG Vorbis audio format. Loaded via AudioStreamOggVorbis.LoadFromBuffer().

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.AudioMp3
member.summary: MP3 audio format. Loaded into AudioStreamMP3.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.DataJson
member.summary: JSON data format for scenes, behaviors, etc.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.DataYaml
member.summary: YAML data format for behaviors, configuration.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.Binary
member.summary: Binary data (generic).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.FromExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the preferred content type from a file extension.
member.param: File extension (with or without leading dot).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.ToExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the file extension for a content type.
member.returns: File extension without leading dot, or "bin" for unknown types.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.IsRuntimeLoadable(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a content type can be loaded by Godot at runtime.
member.returns: True if Godot has native runtime loading support.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.RequiresConversion(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the content type requires conversion for Godot runtime loading.
member.returns: True if conversion is needed before runtime loading.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotContentTypes.GetConversionTarget(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the target content type for conversion.
member.returns: Target content type for conversion, or original if no conversion needed.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer
member.summary: Type inferencer for assets targeting Godot engine. Handles model, texture, animation, and audio files. Filters out engine-specific files that aren't compatible with Godot.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.RuntimeModelExtensions
member.summary: Model file extensions that Godot can load at runtime. Godot uses GltfDocument.AppendFromBuffer() for runtime mesh loading.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.ConvertibleModelExtensions
member.summary: Model file extensions that require conversion for Godot. These formats need external conversion to glTF before bundling.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.AllModelExtensions
member.summary: All model file extensions (both runtime and convertible).

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.RuntimeTextureExtensions
member.summary: Texture file extensions that Godot can load at runtime.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.ConvertibleTextureExtensions
member.summary: Texture file extensions that require conversion.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.AllTextureExtensions
member.summary: All texture file extensions.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.RuntimeAudioExtensions
member.summary: Audio file extensions that Godot can load at runtime.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.ConvertibleAudioExtensions
member.summary: Audio file extensions that require conversion.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.AllAudioExtensions
member.summary: All audio file extensions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.IsRuntimeLoadable(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an extension can be loaded directly by Godot at runtime.
member.returns: True if Godot can load this format from a buffer at runtime.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.GodotTypeInferencer.RequiresConversion(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if an extension needs conversion before Godot can load it.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotAssetProcessor
member.summary: Processes assets for Godot runtime loading. Mostly pass-through for compatible formats, with optional conversion for incompatible ones.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotAssetProcessor.#ctor(BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotAssetProcessor})
member.summary: Creates a new Godot asset processor.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessedAsset
member.summary: Represents an asset processed for Godot runtime loading.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessedAsset.SourceFilename
member.summary: Original source filename before any conversion.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessedAsset.OriginalContentType
member.summary: Original content type before conversion (if converted).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessedAsset.WasConverted
member.summary: Whether the asset was converted from another format.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessedAsset.GodotAssetType
member.summary: Asset type as determined by Godot type inferencer.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessedAsset.TextureTypeHint
member.summary: Texture type hint for texture assets.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessingException
member.summary: Exception thrown when Godot asset processing fails.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessingException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new Godot processing exception.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessingException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Creates a new Godot processing exception with inner exception.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessingException.ConversionFailed(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a processing exception for a conversion failure.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessingException.ConverterNotFound(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a processing exception for a missing converter.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessingException.AssetId
member.summary: Gets the asset ID that failed processing, if available.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessingException.SourceFormat
member.summary: Gets the original format of the asset, if available.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessingException.TargetFormat
member.summary: Gets the target format for conversion, if available.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for Godot asset processing.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions.EnableConversion
member.summary: Whether to enable format conversion for incompatible formats. When true, attempts to convert FBX to glTF, TGA to PNG, etc.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions.SkipUnconvertible
member.summary: Whether to skip assets that require conversion when conversion is disabled or when the converter is not available. When false, throws an exception for unconvertible assets.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions.FbxConverterPath
member.summary: Path to external FBX to glTF converter (e.g., FBX2glTF). If not specified, FBX files will be skipped or cause an error.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions.MaxTextureSize
member.summary: Maximum texture dimension. Textures larger than this will be downscaled. Set to 0 to disable downscaling.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions.OptimizePng
member.summary: Whether to optimize PNG files by stripping metadata.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions.JpegQuality
member.summary: Target quality for JPEG compression (1-100). Only applies when converting other formats to JPEG.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions.GenerateOrmTextures
member.summary: Whether to generate ORM (Occlusion/Roughness/Metallic) packed textures from separate texture files.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Godot.Processing.GodotProcessorOptions.TrackOriginalFormat
member.summary: Whether to include the original format in metadata when converted.
